title: Why was canned food invented? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why was canned food invented? The story is that Napoleon’s troops were hungry and he didn’t want them to spend much time foraging for food, so he convinced his cook to figure out a way to preserve food. I’m not sure I believe that, because a lot of work had already gone into how to keep food from spoiling. Many people worked on this problem before Napoleon came along. Canning - Wikipedia.

The Invention of Canned Food in the Early 1800s. ... The BBC offers up an exhausting history of tin-based food preservation.
